card_text: 1 Tuner + 1+ non-Tuner LIGHT or DARK monsters$NFor this card's Synchro Summon, you can treat 1 LIGHT or DARK monster you control as a Tuner. If this card is Special Summoned: You can target 1 card on the field; banish it. This card gains these effects based on the original Attributes of materials used for its Synchro Summon.$N●LIGHT: Synchro Monsters you control are unaffected by monster effects activated by your opponent.$N●DARK: Monsters you control cannot be destroyed by battle.
